segments.text: From my view, the kitchen seems bright with daylight from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the sink, towel in hand, focused on her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, water is overflowing profusely from the basin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad to see the puddle growing, soaking everything in sight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She'll be upset later when she realizes the damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the open cabinet reveals the cookie jar full of treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is precariously perched on the tilting stool, hand inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My heart races thinking he might slip and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm raised in hopeful anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her excitement for a cookie is just adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains are pulled back, framing the neat garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Birds might be chirping out there, so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, though, tension builds with every passing second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could warn them all.
segments.speaker: PAR
